subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Wladimir Klitschko stopped Tony Thompson in the sixth round to keep a comfortable hold on his W.B.A., I.B.F. and W.B.O. heavyweight titles Saturday night.
snippet: Wladimir Klitschko stopped Tony Thompson in the sixth round to keep a comfortable hold on his W.B.A., I.B.F. and W.B.O. heavyweight titles Saturday night.
